Jane was born on the last day of Feburary in 2000. Today is her 16-year-old birthday. What is the date a month ago in MM/DD/YYYY?
Options:
(A) 05/04/2016
(B) 07/29/2015
(C) 02/02/2016
(D) 11/08/2015
(E) 01/30/2016
(F) 01/29/2016
model_answer:
LECTURE: Months have either 30 or 31 days. When a month has 30 days, the last day is slightly earlier than the first day. So, the date of the last day of February in 2000 was actually February 1.
This year, 16 years after 2000, 2016 is a leap year. So, February 2016 has 29 days.
So, the date of January 30, 2016, is on a leap year and is 16 years after February 29, 2000. This date is the same as February 29, 2016.
